title: Annual Tax Conference 2025
description: Our flagship annual conference covering the latest in direct and indirect taxation, with keynote speakers from the industry and government.

title: Workshop on AI in Auditing
description: An interactive workshop on leveraging Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning tools to enhance audit efficiency and accuracy.

title: Student Career Guidance Seminar
description: A special seminar for students and newly qualified CAs to explore diverse career paths and opportunities in the finance world.

title: Capital Markets Outlook
description: Join market experts as they discuss the trends, challenges, and opportunities in the Indian capital markets for the upcoming fiscal year.

title: Members Networking Dinner
description: An exclusive social event for members to connect, network, and build professional relationships in a relaxed setting.

title: Advanced Excel for Accountants
description: A hands-on training session to master advanced Excel functions, pivot tables, and data visualization for accounting professionals.
